text: RT-PCR was performed with the following primer pairs, as described in Table-1 : UTR41+/11− targeting the 3' untranslated region (3'-UTR) of the avian coronavirus genome [13] , IBVN+/IBVN− targeting the N gene of IB [14] , and XCE2+/XCE2− targeting the S1 gene [15] .
